title: WIGAN COUNCIL
overview: Local, National and Trade Press Advertising

paragraph.text: Inspiring Healthy Lifestyles is a social enterprise and charitable trust working in Wigan, Selby and Cannock Chase. They aim to provide the very best in leisure and culture, offering superb facilities for the public.

Inspiring healthy lifestyles believe everyone can live a healthier, happier life through greater activity and creativity. That’s why since 2003 Inspiring healthy lifestyles has worked hard to inspire people to make better lifestyle choices and life changing products and services.

A social enterprise and charitable trust working in Wigan (Greater Manchester), Selby (Yorkshire) and Cannock Chase, (Staffordshire), they aim to provide the very best in leisure and culture, creating opportunities for people to change their lives, investing in facilities and adding value for public benefit through fantastic facilities and innovative community programmes.
Their philosophy is simple: Be active, creative and healthy.

Because if everyone starts well, lives well and ages well, the quality of all our lives, and society in general, will be enriched. They manage 10 leisure centres, a museum and theatre, and parks on behalf of our council partners as well as hundreds of community projects to inspire people of all ages to be active whatever their ability.
Heckford pitched to design and print
Inspiring Healthy Lifestyles
latest publications.

Social media platforms are ideal for short-term promotional offers, driving punchy messages and reaching a high number of potential customers. We recently and continue to provide Facebook and Instagram campaigns to introduce offers and incentives available at the various Inspiring Healthy Lifestyles gym sites. Our paid Facebook campaigns are targeted efficiently to ensure the adverts are reaching the right people to achieve the best results.

After each campaign has run, we provided extensive reports, outlining the most popular demographics, reach and click through rate. This information is then utilised in future campaigns as we learn more about the audience we are targeting.

Facebook campaigns are a great way to drive traffic to booking pages on your websites and increase your online conversions. Below are some examples of this in practice with a ‘Learn to Swim’ initiative from Inspiring Healthy Lifestyles and a FootGolf campaign that was a huge success, reaching around 36,000 users in just 10 days.
Below is an Instagram campaign to advertise the new skate park that opened at Howe Bridge Leisure Centre.

We create unique landing pages as a destination for our social media campaigns, tailor made to help promote the latest offers and membership options available. Unique URL’s are a a great way to advertise new equipment, classes and deals.

Haigh High Ropes is a brilliant new adventure parks for adults and children with a head for heights. Our digital team have an eye for a good shot and spent the opening of this obstacle course taking high quality images to use in promotional material and social media campaigns. Image is everything and certainly helps make an impact when opening a new public attraction.
Google Adwords is perfect online advertising technique as it targets users who are physically searching for your services or industry.

We used a Google Remarketing campaign to show display/image adverts to past visitors of the various Inspiring Healthy Lifestyle leisure centre websites as well as targeting certain post codes around the area. These adverts then showed up when users browsed the internet and visited other websites.

Choosing a gym membership ideal for you can take time, especially when you are signing up for a contract, so showing potential customers compelling messages and words of encouragement will remind them of the offer in place and that they do need to act upon it.
Our digital team was approached by Inspiring Healthy Lifestyle for online marketing advice in the awakening of
Howe Bridge Leisure Centre

indoor skate park

Using our expertise, we put forward a full branding and digital media strategy for the campaign. Suggesting a fully integrated social and web campaign, using captivating videos and attractive imagery. Being a full-service agency, we are fortunate to have fantastic resources in order to create everything in-house, from concept to completion.

It took no time at all to recruit local skating and biking enthusiasts to be the first to experience the new indoor skate park at Howe Bridge Leisure Centre. Our team conducted a professional photo and video shoot with the purpose of wowing their key audience across Instagram and Twitter. The video and photos went live across various platforms and both were a huge success.

This was the first time the brand had tested the water with Instagram advertising; and together with a carefully targeted Twitter campaign. It was an experiment that not only helped them achieve an extremely successful launch but has continued to attract footfall to their new skate park.
Cannock Leisure Centre approached Heckford to refresh the branding within the reception area as well as wall vinyls and large format print to keep the ‘Be Yourself’ message consistent throughout.
Cannock Leisure Centre Internal Signage
We also produced the internal signage for the Haigh Woodland Park Courtyard Cafe & Tea Room, including wall vinyls and menu boards throughout.

This dance and fitness studio revamp for Hindley Leisure Centre included large format print and internal poster casing with inspirational messages on, offering words of encouragement to members participating at the gym.
Hindley Leisure Centre Internal Signage

Heckford took over all the internal signage for Howe Bridge Leisure Centre. This refit included banner stands, portable display systems, large format print, internal poster cases and mesh banners. We also produced digital wall vinyls for the spinning class studio, an alternative internal signage solution that looked incredibly effective in the dark.
Howe Bridge Internal Signage
Howe Bridge External Signage

Haigh Woodland Park recently opened an outdoor adventure course ‘Haigh High Ropes’ for adults and children alike. As well as covering the launch of this attraction through online advertising and print, we also supplied a range of external signage for the course highlighting what is involved, safety messages as well as terms and conditions.

We provide branded merchandise for all promotional items throughout the gyms. Here we supplied branded disposables such as hot drink cups, cold drink cups, food labels and food packaging for the ‘Subs Bench’ Cafe at Howe Bridge Leisure Centre.
TOMY is a leading Japanese entertainment company that makes children’s toys and merchandise.
Back in 2010, TOMY invited Heckford to tender against four other companies for their exhibition work. Thanks to our expertise and innovative ideas; we were successful!

Since then, we have developed a long standing relationship and have thoroughly enjoyed designing and building TOMY’s exhibition stands on five different occasions; including exhibitions for Toy Fair in London and Nuremberg.

Pleased with Heckford’s creative minds, experience and professionalism; TOMY have chosen Heckford to produce their exhibition for this year’s British Toy and Hobby Association Fair at Olympia – where their stand is the biggest it has ever been at 126m2!
We have also had the pleasure of producing Point of Sale print, and supplying POS display solutions and logistics for TOMY goods to be shipped around the world!

A particularly exciting project was undertaking the design of their brand new Hong Kong show room back in 2013; seeing the potential in their space, our CGI & 3D specialists created contemporary concepts to bring ideas to life.

Nichols plc is an international soft drinks business reaching sales in over 85 countries. Vimto was the first iconic brand, not just extremely popular in the UK, but around the world. Since 1908, the range of drinks has expanded greatly with 100% natural Feel Good, Levi Roots, Frozen Beverages such as Starslush and Icecream Shake, Panda and Sunkist.
Heckford gave Vimto the ‘Feel Good’ factor
The Feel Good brand was developed in July 2015.

There is a huge demand for drinks made from natural resources that are healthier options, which is exactly what the Feel Good factor brings to the market, a tasty drink with 100% natural ingredients and no added sugar!

We designed and created the below pull-up banners that generate a large display area for brand awareness and maximum exposure of the ‘Feel Good’ drinks range. Catering for all sizes and with a quick turnaround, these roll up banners provide portable exhibition or retail display units that are cost effective and efficient, taking up limited floor space!
Heckford were extremely pleased to be approached by
Vimto
Soft Drinks and asked to design and build them a new trade stand for use at exhibitions, trades shows and conferences taking place around the UK this year.
Showcased at Nisaway in Coventry and
P&H Pro Retail Show
in Telford, the fully branded stand featured customised cool boxes, t.v. surroundings and oversize cans.

Will Woodward from Marketing at Vimto Soft Drinks commented, “A great improvement on [our] previous years and all who attended were impressed. It has most certainly been an adaptable solution which we will continue to use for future events.”
Leaping from our printers (pardon the pun) is Vimto’s newest addition to their summer campaign, Vimtoad.

Vimto entrusted Heckford with the print and build of their latest exhibition stand due to excellent past experiences and the assurance of a high quality finish; which we think is “fan-flipping-tastic”!
We have recently produced a series of pop-up banners to brand and advertise a new milkshake drink, supplied to 9 different individual retail outlets across the North West.
Galliford Try is a FTSE 250 Business and one of the UK’s leading housebuilding and construction groups.
Top 10 housebuilder, Linden Homes is a subsidiary of Galliford Try; offering a distinctive range of new homes and properties throughout the UK.
Heckford have undertaken numerous projects for Galliford Try and Linden Homes, such as signage, media bookings, design and print; covering the North West, South West and Wales.
If you’ve ever been to Heckford’s head quarters, you’ll have seen our array of internal signage, custom wallpaper and quirky wall features – all created in-house.
As experts in this area, we know how it’s done and how to help make our client’s offices and show rooms stand out.
We helped Galliford Try install their company branding into one of their offices; including bespoke feature walls, reception desk and window customisation.
Heckford have been producing quality outdoor signage for nearly 40 years. Recently, we have been providing pylon and banner signs for Linden Homes across the North West, South West and Wales.

Acrylic signage looks high-tech and sophisticated, making any office or showroom look the part. The posters we created for the Galliford Try offices were second to none; adding a professional ambience to every room.
Lloyd Motor Group represents prestige brands, such as BMW, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Honda, Jaguar, Land Rover, MINI and Volvo.
Heckford have created and implemented a range of innovative campaigns for Lloyd BMW and MINI in Blackpool, Carlisle, Cockermouth, Colne, Newcastle and South Lakes.
As always, our team had some great ideas and were raring to go with the various projects Lloyd needed; which included advertising, digital, direct mail, an exhibition stand and SMS/MMS.

Lloyd Group asked Heckford to design a digital brochure for their 6 MINI dealerships and their BMW dealerships. The clean and attractive design includes interactive elements; making the brochure fun and appealing to its audience.

Lloyd BMW and MINI asked Heckford to create an email campaign for their exclusive
Twelve Hour Opportunity
event. The sleek design and build mirrored their direct mail campaign for brand and campaign consistency.

An email campaign for Lloyd MINI’s Clubman launch managed to enhance the integration of other platforms; ensuring the appropriate calls to action were implemented to engage users. This included prominent social media links to exclusive launch content, such as photos and video.
With their Christmas Markets fast approaching, Lloyd BMW Blackpool and Colne asked us to create a jovial direct mail campaign to invite customers and locals to attend.
Disguised as a present, the cross-brochure invitation opened up to reveal a merry masterpiece detailing the event’s festivities.

Alongside the email campaign for their Twelve Hour Opportunity, Lloyd BMW and Lloyd MINI in Blackpool and Newcastle wanted to target customers and potential customers in their local area through direct mail.
With a super fast turn around, Heckford designed a cut-out pocket envelope containing a leaflet and organised both print and postage.

An impressive MMS campaign to advertise the BMW 3 Series was created and sent out to existing and potential customers of Lloyd BMW Colne and Lloyd BMW Blackpool. The concept was designed with the aim of creating something a little bit different; not just capturing the attention of their direct audience, but encouraged them to show their friends and family.

Heckford were asked to head-up Lloyd’s Facebook campaigns for Lloyd BMW Blackpool and Lloyd BMW Colne’s Christmas Markets. Taking the Christmas season by storm, we created festive cover photos, post images, event pages, advertisements and paid boosts.

Attractive artwork was created in anticipation of the New MINI Clubman launch, which was used to implement Facebook advertisements, boosted posts, competitions, cover photos and event pages as part of a fully-integrated online campaign; in which Heckford had the pleasure of managing.

To introduce the Lloyd name across the South Lakes, and promote their new MINI and BMW dealerships, we designed a range of full-page and half-page adverts to be featured in numerous print publications across the local area, such as Lancashire Life.
46% of users take some sort of action after viewing a video ad, according to Online publishers association.
Following corporate guidelines, we created a slideshow video to coincide with Lloyd MINI’s online Clubman campaign.
The footage was distributed on the Facebook pages and email campaigns for Lloyd MINI Blackpool, Carlisle, Cockermouth, Colne, Newcastle and South Lakes.
Heckford attended Lloyd MINI Blackpool’s 1oth annual Halloween MINI Drive out; which coincided with an exclusive first look at the new MINI Clubman.
Our photographer snapped some of the best MINI moments and captured the spooky scene – great assets for using across social media, email marketing and direct mail for years to come.

Lloyd BMW Blackpool used our expertise in designing and constructing a promotional stand to advertise the new BMW 7 Series in the wake of its launch. Enabling the range to embrace its exclusivity, the car was concealed within the booth – enticing customers in for the big reveal.
The Healthy Heroes resource was developed by the Lancashire Healthy Schools Programme with the aim to raise awareness of healthy eating and physical activity.

With a brief to raise awareness of healthy eating and physical exercise, our talented team of creatives set to work conceptualising a team of healthy superheroes in order to appeal to the imaginations of the county’s children.
The cartoon illustration and bright colours is designed to be eye catching and fun.

title: HAVEN FUNERAL SERVICES
overview: Local, National and Trade Press Advertising

paragraph.text: Haven Funeral Services is an independent company, operating funeral homes in West London and Hillingdon with an international business that provides funeral services throughout the UK.

We have recently built a strong relationship with Fred Hamer, a subsidiary company to Haven, that have been providing families in the North West with the best funeral care for almost 100 years. This prestige, family run business, put together bespoke packages from a wide range of services, such as floral arrangements, funeral vehicles, coffins and caskets, bereavement counselling and catering, to the highest standard.

We recently refreshed the brand personality of Haven Funeral Services, taking an alternative approach by introducing imagery that focused on people enjoying life. This uplifting feel indicates Haven have your future plans in control so you can concentrate on experiencing the now.
Heckford designed and built a series of sales/promotional point of sale stands which were placed in a number of garden centres and retail stores, one of which was Winfields Outdoors.

This ‘letter box’ style display stand allowed passers-by and potential customers to fill in a form in their own time, which allowed them to receive more information about the services Fred Hamer provides. This style of stand didn’t just promote the company name, it also built up a customer database of potential consumers who were interested in the company.
Our bold and fun design grabbed customers’ attention, without the need of present staff.
Heckford have helped Fred Hamer Funeral Services target numerous audiences across a range of different mediums, one of which being local press.
Each newspaper/press advert has been designed and printed to suit each individual client’s style and requirements; which has enabled our studio to get their creative juices flowing.

At Heckford, we are responsible for booking around 18 press/media bookings per week for a variety of funeral service companies under Hamer Funeral Care. These include Fred Hamer, Hillside Memorials, Gibson House Funerals and Booth and Wolstenholme Funeral Service amongst many others.

As well as the creation, we also take full responsibility in booking the adverts to be placed in a number of well known established newspapers, such as the Lancashire Telegraph, The Bolton News and The Bury News.

Watermouth Family Castle and Theme Park offers a fun and magical experience for all the family, based in Ilfracombe, North Devon. As well as the light, music and fountain displays at the underground Water Show Extravaganza, there is an array of rides and attractions such as Castle Treasures and Gnome Land.
After seeing the illustration and design work Heckford completed for other theme parks, Watermouth contacted us for help with their branding.

At Heckford, we have produced a range of park maps for the tourism industry and after admiring our recent project for Crealy Adventure Park, also based down south in Devon, Watermouth approached us to give their branding a refresh.
Our task was to re-design the park’s logos, including rides and attractions, injecting bold imagery and bright colours to bring the magical and fantasy theme to life.

In order for the new brochure to enhance the personality of theme park, our team of talented illustrators travelled down to take images, so the attractions and park characters could be visualised and illustrated into a full resort brochure and map.

Watermouth were extremely pleased with the results. The brighter colours, typeface and character illustrations attract your attention and the visuals of the rides on the map make it easier for customers to navigate their way round. The overall aim was to show how appealing the park is to young children and their parents. We certainly think that has been achieved!

Park maps give customers an opportunity to plan their route for the day. The aim was to use large recognisable illustrations to ease customers experience of navigation through the park, especially with a handful of children! Check out this before and after; from initial illustration, to the finished product. The new map is bursting with bright colours, fun imagery and important attraction information.
After seeing the illustration and design work Heckford completed for other theme parks, Watermouth contacted us for help with their branding.

Impressed with the exceptional level of skill shown for the brochure and map, we were thrilled to undertake the redesign of the attraction’s website. With it being a an e-commerce website, it was vital to use the same bright colours and imagery to entice users to buy tickets online. Our talented web design team animated the original character illustrations to give the website an interactive feel. The overall web design is fun, inviting, memorable and certainly appealing to parents of those with young children.
The website has been optimised to successfully work on desktop, tablet and mobile, so users can easily read the attraction information, look up opening times and most importantly, book tickets.

Panaz is one of Europe’s leading suppliers of high-quality decorative fabrics and wall coverings for the Hospitality, Healthcare and Corporate sectors. For more than 25 years as UK fabric suppliers, Panaz has focused on design excellence and differentiation through technical innovation resulting in a diverse and comprehensive range of beautiful, exclusive and durable fire retardant furnishing fabrics.

Heckford were extremely pleased when approached by Panaz Contract Fabrics to support them in the design, supply and construction of their exhibition stands for two large-scale events. These events were Architect@Work in Kortrijk and the British Contract Furnishing Association at the Old Truman brewery in London, both of which were a huge success.

Starting out as a filling station and repairs workshop back in 1960, Helston Motor Group is now one of the 25 largest in Britain, and its 37 franchise dealerships provide customers throughout Cornwall, Devon, Somerset and Dorset with high-quality new and used cars and vans from thirteen different manufacturers; including BMW and MINI.
Heckford have created and implemented a range of innovative campaigns for their Westerly BMW and Westerly MINI dealerships in Barnstaple, Bridgwater, Dorchester, Exeter and Yeovil.
Our team have had the pleasure of working on Direct Mail, Email, MMS, Outdoor Advertising, Pay Per Click, Social Media and Video projects for Westerly Group; see examples of our projects below.

Our video editors created a video compilation to promote a sales event at Westerly MINI Barnstaple, to be used in social media campaigns. The advert embraces the retro style of the iconic MINI, whilst portraying the modern technology and design of their newest models.
Our team of Google Adwords Certified Specialists have been busy creating and managing Search and Remarketing Display campaigns for Westerly BMW and Westerly MINI.

They used their expertise and brand knowledge to create awareness of the new BMW 5 series saloon, the new MINI Countryman, and the release of the 17 plate for both brands across the Google Display Network and making sure that both Westerly BMW and Westerly MINI competitively appear on a Google search for relevant keywords/terms. See examples of our Google Display artwork below.
With the average office worker receiving 121 emails per day, it is important for your email campaigns to stand out amongst the crowd.
Heckford designed and built two campaigns for Westerly to promote the launch of the new BMW 5 series saloons and new MINI Countryman.
Running alongside other digital media, Heckford also created numerous paid social media campaigns for the company.

Our social media experts created highly targeted Facebook and Twitter campaigns; including successful video view and GIF campaigns for awareness, carousel ads for website clicks and lead generation adverts for collecting data and direct leads.
Heckford recently designed a 48 sheet billboard for Westerly MINI Exeter to advertise the spacious MINI Clubman, which was posted in several prime locations across the city.

An “eye-catching” invite was created by our studio and sent out to approximately 3,000 addresses across Exeter, Barnstaple, Bridgwater, Yeovil and Dorchester to raise awareness of Westerly BMW’s i Range event, which took place in May 2017.
Chorley Remembers is a major heritage project devised, managed and delivered by Trustees behind the Chorley Pals Memorial, a registered charity no. 1121707, based in the Lancashire market town.
Heckford Exhibitions was appointed by charity Chorley Remembers to design and create an interactive exhibition commemorating local residents who fought in con icts since 1914.

The permanent exhibition, on display at Astley Hall in Chorley uses the latest technology to illustrate what life was like for the Chorley Pals, who were on the front line of the battle of the Somme in 1916. Visitors are able to use touch-screen technology to go on a journey through history, discovering the stories of the war heroes, as well as exploring a detailed recreation of what life was like in the trenches through realistic sets.
Sketches and illustrations were made to size using measurements and photos taken from Astley Hall.
Charley Pal, the project’s mascot, aimed at educating a younger audience.
Large interpretation panels, cover everything from the First World War, trench life, the Second World War, the local Royal Ordnance Factory (1938 – 2007) up to modern times.
With the use of 3D visuals, the layout design was agreed before any prints were made.
Being highly experienced in the Travel and Tourism sector, Heckford were entrusted with Crealy Adventure Parks’ advertising needs.

Crealy Adventure Parks consisted of two award-winning family attractions, Devon’s Crealy Adventure Park in Exeter and Cornwall’s Crealy Adverture Park in Wadebridge, as well as camping and glamping site, Crealy Meadows.

We provided a wide range of services for Crealy, including; design, print, map illustration, signage, brochures, leaflets, posters, indoor and outdoor advertising, vehicle wraps, website design and maintenance, SEO, pay per click, social media, character creation and CGI video.
Bright colours, compelling text and attractive imagery; all components in the creation of fun, family-friendly magazine and newspaper adverts for Crealy Adventure Park.
We know how to make a statement; and what better way to make one, than with large format billboard ads!

Our media buyers know a fantastic opportunity when they see one. The petrol-pump adverts we designed for Devon’s Crealy Adventure Park were a real success, with the perfectly relatable tagline “…Are We There Yet?”.
Family-friendly social media strategies were installed to create a prominent buzz amongst followers; running competitions, games, sharing photographs and gathering user-generated content.
It was our responsibility to help produce fully integrated digital campaigns in order to increase awareness and excitement surrounding events, ride launches and national holidays.
Facebook and Twitter cover photos were often drawn up to mirror the website takeovers and advertising campaigns.

Search and Display campaigns were set up to attract potential visitors to Devon’s Crealy’s website. We used placements, keywords and interest targeting to appear in front of the right people on relevant websites; we also added remarketing to target those who had visited the website in the past.
We created weekly email campaigns for the adventure parks. Each was fully bespoke and precisely targeted; advertising member exclusive offers, events, news, promotions and special launches.
Not your standard work transportation! Our Crealy van wraps are the perfect way to brighten up rush hour…

If your company has transport, it is prime advertising space for you to promote your brand message. Heckford can help to utilise this space by creating bespoke designs that make vehicles stand out on the road.

The reputation of our talented illustrators preceded us; as we were asked to redesign, and install some life back into, Crealy’s park maps. Bursting with colour, the technical designs have been used in brochures, leaflets, signage and online.
Having seen our previous CGI work, Crealy asked us to create a thrilling trailer that would make a huge impact on their target audience prior to the launch of their new ride – Dino Jeeps.
Working to an exceptionally tight deadline of just 10 days, our talented 3d and CGI specialists managed to pull out all the stops and deliver on time!
Our digital team produced an impressive, prehistoric web takeover ahead of the Dino Jeeps launch to ensure all visitors knew; the dinosaurs have arrived!

Our Crealy Christmas takeovers never failed to get website visitors in the festive spirit! The attractive takeovers helped promote special events surrounding the season, and boost ticket sales during the holidays.
